summary: Web developer who is a go-to expert for git, ES6, accessibility and Slack. Keen eye for polishing features, syntax errors and spelling mistakes. Likes to poke fun at friends by coding up their startup ideas.

info: Planned and led a meeting for project retrospective. Reviewed hurdles and facilitated discussion.

Performed accessibility testing and discovered fifty accessibility-related defects, including some that were not found during testing of the previous release. Presented tutorial on screen-reader technology to fifty team members, due to recognized expertise.
